theorem.name: visit2_inductive_clause

text.english:
Inductive clause of the definition of \(\texttt{visit2}\):

\begin{gather*} \forall t_1,t_2 \in L_A .\; \forall a \in A .\\ \texttt{visit2}(N(t_1, a, t_2)) =\\ a :: \texttt{app}(\texttt{visit2}(t_1), \texttt{visit2}(t_2)) \end{gather*}
text.italiano:
Clausola induttiva della definizione di \(\texttt{visit2}\):

\begin{gather*} \forall t_1,t_2 \in L_A .\; \forall a \in A .\\ \texttt{visit2}(N(t_1, a, t_2)) =\\ a :: \texttt{app}(\texttt{visit2}(t_1), \texttt{visit2}(t_2)) \end{gather*}

theorem.coq:
Theorem visit2_inductive_clause : forall (t1 t2 : btn) (a : nat) , visit2 (N t1 a t2) = a :: app (visit2 t1) (visit2 t2).
Proof.
reflexivity.
Qed.
